```{r, echo = F}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(tidy.opts = list(width.cutoff = 60), tidy = TRUE)
```
```{r}
library(nnet)
```
```{r}
iris <- read.csv(file = './Data_csv/Iris.csv')
iris$class <- factor(iris$class)
itest <- sample(150, size = 30)
iris_test <- iris[itest,]
iris_train <- iris[-itest,]
```
```{r}
net <- nnet(class ~ . - class, data = iris_train, size = 1)
```
```{r}
summary(net)
```
```{r}
predict(net)
```
```{r}
yhat <- predict(net, newdata = iris_test)
yhat
```
```{r}
yhat <- predict(net, newdata = iris_test, type = 'class')
yhat
```
```{r}
table(iris_test$class, yhat)
```
```{r}
net <- nnet(class ~ . - class, data = iris_train, size = 1, Wts = rep(0, 11))
```
```{r}
yhat <- predict(net, newdata = iris_test, type = 'class')
yhat
```
```{r}
table(iris_test$class, yhat)
```
